data.enText: the buildings of a university or college and the land around them
She lives on campus (= within the main university area) .

simple_means.memory_skill: camp 田野 + us 表名词，用于科学术语 → 校园

tr: a field on which the buildings of a university are situated

value.def: A campus is an area of land that contains the main buildings of a university or college.

example.tran: 在大学校园的一次集会中

example.ex: Private automobiles are not allowed on campus.
example.tran: 大学校园不许私人汽车入内。

trans: 在校园内；在校园里；在校内；全校
校外；在校园外；在校外；校园外；不住校

partsOfSpeech.d: 营地（营地一般都在野外）

partsOfSpeech.dec: camp 田野 + aign → 营地 → 战役
camp 田野 + us 表名词，用于科学术语 → 校园
en 进入…之中 + camp 营地 → 宿营
